languages.text: {n}Три вещи обращают на себя внимание: обломки неких устройств, которые носили на поясе оба скелета, какие-то блестящие побрякушки в остатках сумки у того мертвеца, которого несли, и старый портативный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} у второго.{/n}

{n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Три вещи обращают на себя внимание: обломки неких устройств, которые носили на поясе оба скелета, какие-то блестящие побрякушки в остатках сумки у того мертвеца, которого несли, и старый портативный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} у второго.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There are three things here that catch your attention: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable cogitator in the other one's bag.{/n}

{n}There are three things here that catch your attention: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable cogitator in the other one's bag.{/n}

{n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable cogitator in the other's bag.{/n}

{n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable cogitator in the other's bag.{/n}

{n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一共有三件东西值得注意。两具白骨的腰带上挂着某种装置的碎片，其中一个背包内装着几件发亮的小饰品，另一个背包内放着一台老旧的便携式{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一共有三件东西值得注意。两具白骨的腰带上挂着某种装置的碎片，其中一个背包内装着几件发亮的小饰品，另一个背包内放着一台老旧的便携式{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hay tres cosas dignas de atención: los fragmentos de una serie de dispositivos que ambos esqueletos llevaban en sus cinturones, unas baratijas relucientes en los restos de la bolsa del esqueleto transportado y un viejo {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} portátil en la bolsa del otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay tres cosas dignas de atención: los fragmentos de una serie de dispositivos que ambos esqueletos llevaban en sus cinturones, unas baratijas relucientes en los restos de la bolsa del esqueleto transportado y un viejo {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} portátil en la bolsa del otro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}注目に値するものはこの3つだ。両方の骸骨がベルトに装着していたなんらかの装置の破片。抱えられていた方の骸骨のバッグの残骸の中にあったいくつかのきらきらした装飾品。そしてもう一方の骸骨のバッグの中に入っていた古い携帯用{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}注目に値するものはこの3つだ。両方の骸骨がベルトに装着していたなんらかの装置の破片。抱えられていた方の骸骨のバッグの残骸の中にあったいくつかのきらきらした装飾品。そしてもう一方の骸骨のバッグの中に入っていた古い携帯用{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drei Dinge fallen dir auf: Fragmente irgendwelcher Geräte, die beide Skelette am Gürtel trugen, einige glänzende Schmuckstücke in den Überresten des Beutels des getragenen Skeletts und ein alter tragbarer {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} im Beutel des anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drei Dinge fallen dir auf: Fragmente irgendwelcher Geräte, die beide Skelette am Gürtel trugen, einige glänzende Schmuckstücke in den Überresten des Beutels des getragenen Skeletts und ein alter tragbarer {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} im Beutel des anderen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trois éléments retiennent votre attention : les fragments d'un appareil que les deux squelettes portaient à la ceinture, quelques babioles brillantes dans le sac du squelette étreint par son comparse, et un vieux {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} portable dans le sac de l'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trois éléments retiennent votre attention : les fragments d'un appareil que les deux squelettes portaient à la ceinture, quelques babioles brillantes dans le sac du squelette étreint par son comparse, et un vieux {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} portable dans le sac de l'autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dikkate şayan üç şey var: İki iskeletin de kemerinde taşıdığı bir tür cihazın parçaları, taşınan iskeletin çantasındaki birtakım parlak incik boncuk ve ötekinin çantasındaki eski, portatif bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are three things worthy of note: fragments of some sort of devices that both skeletons carried on their belts, some shiny trinkets in the remains of the carried skeleton's bag, and an old portable {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} in the other's bag.{/n}
